Series.Actors: |Robert Carlyle|Justin Louis|Brian J. Smith|David Blue|Lou Diamond Phillips|Elyse Levesque|Jamil Walker Smith|Alaina Huffman|Ming-Na|Richard Dean Anderson|Patrick Gilmore|Haig Sutherland|Jennifer Spence|Mark Burgess|Peter Kelamis|Julia Benson|
Series.Overview: The previously unknown purpose of the ninth chevron is revealed and takes a group of refugees on a one-way trip to a millions of years old Ancient-built ship. Led by Dr. Nicolas Rush and Colonel Everett Young, the refugees are trapped on the ship, unable to change its programmed mission.
